mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.name AS categoryName, t3.cname AS unitCname, t3.ename AS unitEname FROM material t1 LEFT JOIN food_category t2 ON t2.id = t1.categoryId LEFT JOIN measurement t3 ON t3.id = t1.unit WHERE t1.id = #{materialId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material(name, img, price, unit, profile, categoryId, createTime, updateTime, operator) VALUES (#{name}, #{img}, #{price}, #{unit}, #{profile}, #{categoryId}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000, UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000, #{operator})
mapper.update:
UPDATE material
name = #{name}, img = #{img}, price = #{price}, unit = #{unit}, profile = #{profile}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, operator = #{operator},
updateTime=#{updateTime}, updateTime = UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000
WHERE id = #{id}
